# autoclust ![](reference/figures/logo.png)

[![License:
MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)](LICENSE)
[![GitHub
release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/Anacristina0914/autoclust)](https://github.com/Anacristina0914/autoclust/releases)  
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/887137273.svg)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17569306)

> Automated clustering and association testing for patient
> stratification using antibody, proteomic, and clinical data.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Overview

`autoclust` is an R package designed for **unsupervised clustering** and
**association testing** in heterogeneous biomedical datasets.  
It supports:  
- Clustering with Gower distance, PAM, and other algorithms  
- Cluster evaluation via silhouette, bootstrap stability, and consensus
metrics  
- Association testing with clinical variables using frequentist or
Bayesian logistic regression  
- Visualization tools for cluster separation, stability, and clinical
effect sizes

Originally developed for patient stratification in **Systemic Lupus
Erythematosus (SLE)** cohorts, `autoclust` is applicable to any
multi-feature biomedical dataset with mixed data types.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Installation

You can install the latest development version directly from GitHub:

    # Install devtools if you haven't already
    install.packages("devtools")

    # Install autoclust
    devtools::install_github("Anacristina0914/autoclust")

# Package index

## All functions

- [`acr_subgroups_paper_colors()`](acr_subgroups_paper_colors.md) :
  Retrieve Colors for ACR Subgroups and Other Variables
- [`cluster_eval()`](cluster_eval.md) : Evaluate Clustering Performance
  Using Mixed Data
- [`compute_bootstrap_stability()`](compute_bootstrap_stability.md) :
  Compute Bootstrap Clustering Stability
- [`compute_dissimilarity_matrix()`](compute_dissimilarity_matrix.md) :
  Compute and Visualize a Dissimilarity Matrix
- [`extract_aa_columns()`](extract_aa_columns.md) : Extract Autoantibody
  and Subgroup Columns
- [`generate_synthetic_clusters()`](generate_synthetic_clusters.md) :
  Generate Synthetic Clustered Datasets
- [`ki_colors()`](ki_colors.md) : Retrieves KI Colors
- [`make_aa_lineplot()`](make_aa_lineplot.md) : Make line plot for
  autoantibody frequencies per subgroup
- [`make_forest_plot()`](make_forest_plot.md) : Create a Forest Plot of
  Association Results
- [`plot_custom_umap()`](plot_custom_umap.md) : Plot UMAP across
  different neighbors and min_distance values.
- [`plot_most_similar_dissimilar()`](plot_most_similar_dissimilar.md) :
  Plot Most Similar and Most Dissimilar Pairs from a Dissimilarity
  Matrix
- [`rank_run_fsgsea()`](rank_run_fsgsea.md) : Run Ranked Gene Set
  Enrichment Analysis (fGSEA) from limma Results
- [`run_associations()`](run_associations.md) : Run Association Analyses
  Between Clinical Manifestations (outcome) and a predictor variable
  (e.g. patient subgroup)
- [`run_custom_umap()`](run_custom_umap.md) : Run UMAP with Custom
  Parameters
- [`signif_label()`](signif_label.md) : Convert p-value to significance
  label
- [`theme_clustering()`](theme_clustering.md) : Custom ggplot2 theme for
  subgroups SLE
- [`transform_data_for_line_plot()`](transform_data_for_line_plot.md) :
  Transform Autoantibody Data for Line Plot
- [`violin_plot_ggstats_style()`](violin_plot_ggstats_style.md) : Create
  a stylized violin plot with jittered points and boxplots
- [`visualize_clusters()`](visualize_clusters.md) : Visualize Clustering
  Results with t-SNE and UMAP
